title: Black Belt udyr missing gloves in model
body: Something small I noticed, don't think I really need to explain anymore than that.

replies.body:
Hey Arcanine3831! 

Are you referring to the in-game model versus the splash?

If so, it's not uncommon for there to be small differences between the two.

Yeah I am, before Udyr got a mass texture update he had them 
http://mmorpg-tactics.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/08/League-of-Legends-Udyr-Champion-In-Game-Skins-Black-Belt-Udyr-Skin-520-RP.jpg
It isn't a bug they switched the old splash art to the chinese one.
